title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

In order to receive any credit, both a correct figure of speech and correct Latin must be included in the answer. Minimal Latin bolded.

Three possible answers:

  • apostrophe - Improbe Amor

  • personification - Improbe Amor

  • synecdoche - pectora (with an appropriate explanation)
descriptions:
